summary: This bill, the 'Preserving Rights Of Tenants by Ensuring Compliance To the Second Amendment Act' (PROTECT the Second Amendment Act), aims to prevent federally assisted rental housing from prohibiting residents' lawful possession of firearms. It specifies that residents should be allowed to possess firearms within their dwelling units and in common areas while traveling to and from their units. The bill defines 'covered federally assisted rental housing' by listing specific HUD and USDA programs.
